name: ULevelEditor2DSettings
doc: Configure settings for the 2D Level Editor

bEnable2DWidget: If enabled, shows the 2D combined translate and rotate tool in the viewport toolbar.
bEnableSnapLayers: If enabled, shows the 2D layer snapping controls in the viewport toolbar.
SnapAxis: Sets the world space axis for 2D snap layers.
SnapLayers: Snap layers that are displayed in the viewport toolbar.
